text: The following is a list of deaths that happened in December 2022. For deaths that should be noted before the month that the world is in, please see "Months". Names under each date are noted in the order of the alphabet by last name or pseudonym. Deaths of non-humans are noted here also if it is worth noting. Each listing of death must have a source. If no reference is included, the death notice will be removed. The following are the requirements of adding a name to the list in its order: name, age, where they came from, what the person is known for, cause of death (if known), and a source. == December == === 1 === *Albert Bruschke, 87, Dutch cardiologist, professor at Leiden University Medical Center (1984-2000).In memoriam: Albert Bruschke *Mylène Demongeot, 87, French actress (The Crucible, French California, 36 Quai des Orfèvres), primary peritoneal carcinoma.Mort de Mylène Demongeot : l'actrice est décédée à l'âge de 87 ans *Sylvia La Torre, 89, Filipino actress (One Two Bato, Three Four Bapor) and singer.Sylvia La Torre, Queen of Kundiman, dies at 89 *Quentin Oliver Lee, 34, American baritone and actor (The Phantom of the Opera), colon cancer.Broadway actor Quentin Oliver Lee dies of cancer at 34 *Gaylord Perry, 84, American Hall of Fame baseball player (San Francisco Giants, Cleveland Indians, San Diego Padres).Gaylord Perry, two-time Cy Young winner, dies at 84 === 2 === *Hans Bassant, 79, Dutch footballer (Excelsior Rotterdam).OUD-SPELER HANS BASSANT OVERLEDEN *Frans de Haan, 84, Dutch basketball player (The Wolves Amsterdam, national team) and golfer.death announcement *Floris Maljers, 89, Dutch business executive.Oud-Unilevertopman Maljers (89) overleden === 4 === *Jack van Poll, 88, Dutch jazz musician, music arranger and composer.Muzikant Jack van Poll (1934-2022) kon geen noot lezen: 'Je hoorde wat en dat deden we na’ *Ludo Van Thillo, 91, Belgian businessman.Ludo Van Thillo, erevoorzitter van DPG Media, overleden === 5 === *Kirstie Alley, 71, American actress (Cheers, Veronica's Closet, Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan), Emmy winner (1991, 1994), cancer.Kirstie Alley, ‘Cheers’ and ‘Look Who’s Talking’ Star, Dies at 71 *Claude C. Krijgelmans, 88, Belgian writer, translator and painter.OBITUARY Claude Krijgelmans *Jim Stewart, 92, American Hall of Fame record producer, co-founder of Stax Records.Stax Records co-founder, Rock 'n' Roll Hall of Famer Jim Stewart dies at 92 *Pascale Vandegeerde, 64, Belgian activist.Enige vrouwelijke CCC-lid Pascal Vandegeerde overleden (death announced on this date) === 6 === *Miha Baloh, 94, Slovenian actor (And Love Has Vanished, Among Vultures, Winnetou and the Crossbreed).Poslovil se je igralec Miha Baloh *Jet Black, 84, English drummer (The Stranglers).Jet Black: 'Inspirational' drummer for the Stranglers dies aged 84 *Mills Lane, 85, American boxing referee and television personality (Judge Mills Lane, Celebrity Deathmatch).Beloved Reno icon Mills Lane dies at age 85 *Bart de Vries, 57, Dutch stage and television actor (Soldier of Orange, 3 Musketiers), COVID-19.Acteur Bart de Vries (57) overleden === 7 === *Johan de Jong, 81, Dutch biologist and barn owl expert.Bioloog en uilendeskundige Johan de Jong overleden *Helen Knopper, 88, Dutch writer and translator.Nieuws: Helen Knopper (1934-2022) overleden *Ton Sprangers, 65, Dutch footballer (NAC Breda).Oud NAC-speler Ton Sprangers op 65-jarige leeftijd overleden (death announced on this date) === 8 === *Patrick Delsemme, 48, Belgian snooker player.Snookerwereld in diepe rouw: ex-Belgisch kampioen Patrick Delsemme (48) plots overleden *Max van Rooy, 65, Dutch writer and journalist.Max van Rooy (1942-2022), 44 jaar de biograaf van zijn opa, architect H.P. Berlage *René Snelders, 85, Belgian footballer and businessman.René Snelders, gewezen sterke man van Germinal Ekeren en vader van Eddy, is overleden === 9 === *Ruth Madoc, 79, British actress (Hi-de-Hi!, Fiddler on the Roof, Little Britain), and singer.Ruth Madoc: Hi-de-Hi! actress dies aged 79 *Thiemo Meertens, 76, Dutch footballer and football manager.Voormalig voetbaltrainer Thiemo Meertens (76) overleden === 10 === *Georgia Holt, 96, American singer and actress (Watch the Birdie, Grounds for Marriage), subject of Dear Mom, Love Cher.Cher confirms her mother Georgia Holt death at 96 === 11 === *Chris Boucher, 79, British television screenwriter (Doctor Who, Blakes 7, Shoestring) and novelist.Chris Boucher 1943 - 2022 *Peter Ester, 69, Dutch sociologist and politician, senator (since 2011).ChristenUnie-Eerste Kamerlid Peter Ester (1953) overleden *Pieter ter Veer, 77, Dutch politician, MP (1981-1982; 1989-2002).Melkveehouder en Oud- Kamerlid D66 Pieter ter Veer uit Zuidhorn overleden === 12 === *Joke Folmer, 99, Dutch resistance member.Verzetsstrijder Joke Folmer (99) overleden (death announced on this date) === 13 === *Sol Amarfio, 84, Ghanaian drummer (Osibisa).Sol Amarfio, a founding member of the Osibisa band has died *Al De Boeck, 79, Belgian poet.Dichter Al De Boeck is overleden *Johanna Diepeveen- Speekenbrink, 86, Dutch nurse.Johanna Diepeveen-Speekenbrink (1936-2022): ‘Voorvechter van de emancipatie van de verpleegkunde’ *Han Peekel, 75, Dutch television presenter.Televisiemaker Han Peekel, die Peter R. de Vries als laatste interviewde, overlijdt tijdens vakantie *Curt Simmons, 93, American baseball player (Philadelphia Phillies, St. Louis Cardinals, Chicago Cubs).Curt Simmons, member of 1950 'Whiz Kids,' dies at 93 ===
